cscie259.project1.mf

Interface ContentHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultHandler, DOMBuilder, XMLSerializer

    public interface ContentHandler
    A simplified version of org.xml.sax.ContentHandler. Essentially, any class that implements this interface can "handle the content" encountered by an XML parser. You MAY NOT modify this file.
    Version:
    8.0
    Author:
    Computer Science E-259

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void characters(java.lang.String content)
      Should be called immediately after a chunk of character data is parsed.
      void endDocument()
      Should be called immediately after an XML document is parsed.
      void endElement(java.lang.String name)
      Should be called immediately after an end tag is parsed.
      void startDocument()
      Should be called immediately before an XML document is parsed.
      void startElement(java.lang.String name, Attributes atts)
      Should be called immediately after a start tag is parsed.

    • Method Detail

      • characters

        void characters(java.lang.String content)
        Should be called immediately after a chunk of character data is parsed.
        Parameters:
        content - parsed character data

      • endDocument

        void endDocument()
        Should be called immediately after an XML document is parsed.

      • endElement

        void endElement(java.lang.String name)
        Should be called immediately after an end tag is parsed.
        Parameters:
        name - closed element's name

      • startDocument

        void startDocument()
        Should be called immediately before an XML document is parsed.

      • startElement

        void startElement(java.lang.String name,
                  Attributes atts)
        Should be called immediately after a start tag is parsed.
        Parameters:
        name - opened element's name.
        atts - list of the opened element's attributes
